term: What is Jeffersonâ€™s reaction to LA territory?
content:
the constitution never authorized the president to make land mass purchases this big
jefferson thought that he needed to amend the constitution in order to make this purchase
however, they were able to get around this issue by making the deal as if it were a treaty, and republican majority in the senate ratified it

jefferson had criticized the federalists for increasing the national debt, and in one stroke of a pen, he adds 15 million dollars to it

in his inaugural address, he claimed that we have enough land for our descendants down to the hundredth and thousandth generation
